experiences.title: Fiscozen
experiences.subTitle: Software Engineer
experiences.description: Fiscozen is an online platform in Italy that provides simplified and automated tax preparation and filing services for individuals and small businesses.
bulletList: Implementation of new features related to the world of customer's relation
Integration of backend functionalities with both data modelization and query optimization
Devolopment of new components in the frontend, both for customers and tax experts
Refactor of some olders part of the code base
experiences.tecnologies: Javascript, Vue, Python, Django, Docker, Git, Jira

experiences.title: Freelancer

experiences.description: As a freelance, i help companies to develop mobile or web apps used to interact with clients or to distribute a service

Booking system for study rooms and coworking spaces with integration of payments
Puzzle game with riddles, integration of ads, Goole Play Service and Firebase

experiences.title: NFT Chain
experiences.subTitle: Blockchain Engineer
experiences.description: The aim of Nft Chain is to build a DevEx centric environment to simplify the development of dApps using a blockchain architecture
bulletList: Development of a DSL capable of creating on-chain event triggers
Development of a web development tool capable of programming, visualizing, and explaining how a dApp works within the environment
Time-complexity optimization to reduce fees paid by users for interacting with the blockchain with focus on algorithms and batch transaction
experiences.tecnologies: Rust, Substrate, Typescript, React, IndexedDB, Neo4j, Cypher,  Docker, Git, Github Projects

experiences.title: Amada ISE
experiences.subTitle: Robotics Engineer
experiences.description: As part of the AMADA Global Software Development Department and thanks to over 30 years of experience, AMADA ISE's mission is to provide complete, high-quality, and innovative software products for digital manufacturing in the sheet metal sector using cutting edge technologies.
bulletList: Implementation of algorithms for computational geometry calculation, taking into account the mechanical specifications of the robot
Conceptual, technical, and computational analysis of solutions and bug fixes focused on maintaining performance and avoiding regressions
Weekly release of new features or patches with very tight deadlines
experiences.tecnologies: C#, .NET, C++, Open GL, Python, Git, Microsoft Azure

experiences.title: LINKS Foundation
experiences.subTitle: Software Researcher
experiences.description: LINKS Foundation operates at the heart of the Turin research and innovation ecosystem, in a solid international network. Its target is to contribute to technological and socio-economic progress through advanced processes of applied research.
bulletList: European project ”ICT4CART” for the development of an infrastructure related to the world of connected vehicle communications
Development of highway interconnection modules, with data collection, analysis and transmission of information to the autonomous driving module through the CAN network
Development of an ESP32 module for capturing PROBE requests used to estimate the number of people present in a public space or enclosed area
Proof of concept for an integrated highway traffic simulator using SUMO
experiences.tecnologies: C++, Python, Docker, Raspberry Pi, OpenCV
